name: How You Start
description:
Use arrows , WAD or QZD to move left or right or jump.

Every action can only be executed once , after that the player will keep jumping or running  , the only way to change direction is to hit a wall

You have to reach the portal to win , and there are more than one way to do that so you have to figure it out "some stages have only one solution"

Lets talk about how you can die , you die if you hit obstacles like swings and spikes 

or if you eat the same type of coins twice

There are two types of coins the yellow wich give you a dash forward and the red wich reverses your gravity , that's it , have fun

Plz accept my apologizes if you hate this game and know that this is my first game , i also hate it XD but i had to finish it to move forward and do better in the futur , have a great day
